text: Anandhi also known as Balika Vadhu is an Indian TV series broadcast by Colors TV. The story focused on Anandhi (played by Avika Gor, Pratyusha Banarjee and Toral Rasputra) and Jagdish (played by Shashank Vyas and Shakti Anand), where finding love in earlier years. title: Balika Vadhu
